sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词都有"旅馆，客店"之意。
means: hotel ： 指开设于城镇，有一定设备，可提供食宿的旅馆。
inn ： 多指开设于乡间、路边，设备简陋的小旅店。
motel系motor hotel的混合缩写词，指美国开设于公路旁，专供驾驶汽车的旅客往宿和有停车场的旅店。

sentence.Network_en: The hotel is set plumb in the middle of the high street.
sentence.Network_cn: 宾馆正好坐落在商街的中段。

sentence.Network_en: His team-mates opened hotel windows, shouting "Jump!" and somewhat less printable banter.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的队友打开了酒店的窗户，大叫着“跳！”，还开了一些上不了台面的玩笑。

sentence.Network_en: Free room and board are provided for all hotel staff.
sentence.Network_cn: 宾馆的所有员工都可享受免费膳宿。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 酒店（hotel），传统的概念：为大众提供住宿和餐饮服务的场所。非特主题酒店，非特特别的全新定义的体验型主题酒店。

list.abs: 最经典的10首歌曲 ... The Sound of Silence 寂静之声 Hotel California 加州旅馆 The Eagles 老鹰乐队.
塞西尔酒店建于1927年，位于美国洛杉矶市中心的塞西尔酒店(Cecil Hotel)，曾发生多起诡异命案，美国最著名的命案“黑色大丽花”也 …
《怪物酒店》又名《精灵旅社》（Hotel Transylvania）近日曝光了预告片。影片的英文译名直译过来应该是特兰西瓦尼亚酒店。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: from French hôtel, from Old French hostel (see hostel)

entry.def: A hotel is a building where people stay, for example on holiday, paying for their rooms and meals.

means.word_mean: 1. a building where travelers can pay for lodging and meals and other services

stems_affixes.value_cn: 主人;旅店老板;节目主持人;一大群,许多
stems_affixes.word_buile: host客人→愿意招待客人的人
host客人+age总称→被扣压的[人]的总称

stems_affixes.value_cn: 女主人, 女房东, 女老板, 女服务员, 舞女
stems_affixes.word_buile: host主人,客人,陌生人+ess女性→n.女主人, 女房东, 女老板, 女服务员, 舞女

Sentence.sentence: This year, without a terrorist attack, the hotel industry is "putting the same numbers on the board", says Mr Sorenson.
The hotel bust (不景气), like most busts, was preceded by a breathtaking boom
Hotel owners found themselves with a huge number of empty rooms even as a lot of unnecessary new hotels were ready to open.

It was left behind in the hotel

means.word_mean: 酒店, 饭店, 宾馆, 大旅馆

sentences.en: The hotel is on your left side.
What is the charge for a day at the Hilton Hotel?
sentences.cn: 希尔顿饭店每天收费多少?

jushi.english: The hotel is run entirely in European style.
jushi.chinese: 这家旅馆完全按照欧洲方式经营。

jushi.english: Please remember to hand back your room key before leaving the hotel.
jushi.chinese: 在离开旅馆之前请不要忘记交还你房间的钥匙。

jushi.english: The fire engine rushed to the hotel which was on fire.
jushi.chinese: 救火车朝起火的旅馆急驰而去。
